alert.note: Alert for Southern Cook, North Shore; Southern Lake, North Shore (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued March 20 at 4:00AM CDT until March 22 at 1:00PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY EVENING THROUGH WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 10 inches possible. Winds could gust as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Southern Lake and Southern Cook Counties. This includes the Tribal Lands of the Grand Portage Reservation. * WHEN...From Tuesday evening through Wednesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

area.areaDesc: Southern Cook, North Shore; Southern Lake, North Shore
